output.sentences: I like to spend the night hanging with friends.
In fact my most preferred activity is hanging out with friends.
It's a simple pastime that really makes me happy.
Spending time with people I love makes me extremely happy.
Hanging out with friends is an understandable sign that you care and not just in public.
